title: VIDENT 310Pro Automotive OBD2 Scanner Reader Check Engine Fault Diagnostic Tools
item_description:
📦📦US Stock, it will take 2-5 business days to arrive your home
 ☑️Vident iEasy310Pro OBD2 Scanner Advantage
 👍【Works with most 1996 and newer OBDII & CAN】 compliant cars, works with all 12V standard OBD2 Protocols Vehicles(Cars, Light-duty trucks, SUVs, Mini VANs, Mini trucks,12V minibus and hybrid sold worldwide. 
  👍【All 10 Modes of OBDII Tests】 iEasy310Pro OBDII scanner can perform all 10 modes of OBDII tests for complete OBD2 diagnosis, including reading codes, erase codes, view live data, patented one-click smog check, freeze frame data, O2 monitor test, on-board monitor test, component test, view vehicle information, module present. iEasy310Pro scanner is the most complete & cost-effective OBD2 code reader for home mechanics and DIYers to solve check engine light issues and daily quick checks.
👍【Turn off Check Engine Light(MIL)】The check engine light (CEL) illuminates when your vehicle's computer believes there is a problem that could affect, or is affecting your car's emissions control system. This check engine code reader brings a fast access to scan, read the car emissions-related error code (DTCs), troubleshooting to find the root causes of problems, clear the trouble code and turn off the MIL (Malfunction Indicator Light) after fixed.
👍【Read/Clear Codes and Quick DTC LOOKUP】A Diagnostic Trouble Code (DTC) is set in a vehicle's onboard computer when a fault occurs in any monitored system. DTC codes are sent to the vehicle's instrument panel to trigger a warning light. This car check engine light scanner retrieves generic codes, manufacturer specific codes, pending codes, permanent codes and displays DTC definitions on the TFT screen, find out the root causes and clear the codes after fixed.
👍【Patented One-Click Smog Check & User-Friendly Design】iEasy310Pro engine analyzer features patented I/M One-Click Readiness Key for quick State Emissions readiness check(smog check) and drive cycle verification. Coming with a TFT color display to show DTC definitions more clearly, a built-in speaker provides an audible indication, an LED Indicator, and a long cable,  is super easy to use even if you are new to a car repair
 👍【Live Data Graph and Retrieve Freeze Frame】This engine scanner code reader can read data from vehicle sensors, such as Engine RPM, Intake air temperature, Short/Long term fuel, Misfire data, Throttle position, Engine coolant temperature, Oxygen sensor voltages, Mass air flow and ect. Display 4 PIDs simultaneously and merge them into one to compare. Retrieve freeze frame: DTCFRZF, FUELSYSA, ETC, SHRTFT1, LONGFT1, MAP, RPM, VSS, IAT....etc. 
  👍【Lifetime Software Update & Support 11 Kinds of Languages】iEasy310Pro car diagnostic reader comes with lifetime Free software updates via internet and multilingual menu options like English, French, German, Russian, Spanish, Italian, Portuguese, Hungarian, Swedish, Slovak, Czech.
 🔔Please Note:
1. Update support is limited to a windows based device, Not Support MAC or iOS.
2. This product only supports voltage test and does not support battery parameter detection.
 ☑️Customize Your Boot Interface
DIY Functionfor you to customize your own boot interface. Default setting is boot with Vident logo, but you can replace it with any picture you prefer or with your own logo!
Most functions better than the CR3001,AS500,NT301,ELM327
Vident iEasy310Pro OBDII car diagnostic scan tool is a hand-held design diagnostic device for professional and DIYers, it supports full OBD2 functions to help you read and erase diagnostic trouble codes. One-key I/M readiness helps you to check state emissions readiness and drive cycle verification. With DIY Function, you can put your favorite picture on the screen.
☑️Full 10 OBD2/EOBD Functions
Featuring 10 modes of OBD2 tests, iEasy310 Pro can be compatible with most OBDII protocol compliant cars to read and clear emission codes, show live data, O2 sensor test, On-Board monitor test, component test and view vehicle information etc.
1. Read Code: Read DTCs (Diagnostic Trouble Codes) to locate the issues
2. Erase Code:Clear DTCs to turn off the Check Engine Light after certain repairs
3. Live Data:Display the real time PID data from ECU (as analog inputs and outputs, digital inputs and outputs, and system status information broadcast on the vehicle data stream). The live data produced is accurate and tells you exactly what you require to know about your vehicle.
4. Freeze Frame: Snapshot the precise conditions of the car when a fault code triggers the check engine light, to help identify the problem.
5. I/M readiness: Check the readiness of the monitoring system. It is an excellent function to use prior to having a vehicle inspected for compliance to a state emissions program.
6. O2 Sensor Test:Retrieve O2 sensor monitor test results for the most recently performed tests from the vehicle’s on-board computer.
7. On-Board Monitor Test:Retrieve the test results for emission-related powertrain systems and components that are not continuously monitored to figure out on-board monitor issues
8. Vehicle Information: Display the vehicle identification number (VIN), the calibration identification (CIN), and the calibration verification number (CVN), and other information of the test vehicle.
9. Component Test:Certain vehicle components can be actuated by commands sent from the scanner to test their operability
10. DTC Lookup:Every code in iEasy310Pro comes with a description to aid technicians in efficient vehicle diagnostics and repair.This will save you the trouble of having to go online to look for the meaning of a diagnostic trouble code. And you can also simply click on the error code selected so as to get an in-depth definition.
 ☑️Check & Turn Off Engine Light(MIL)
iEasy310 Pro Check & Turn Off Engine Light, Find out what s wrong with your car and perhaps fix it. Save money and time.
 ☑️How to Update Vident iEasy310 Pro？
1. Download the update tool iEasy310 Pro and update files from Vident Official Website and save the applications and files in computer disk.
2. Double click the iEasy310 Pro desk Top icon to launch the application.
3. Click Setting and select the language you want to update.
4. Press and hold HELP key. Do not release the HELP key, then connect the USB cable.
5. When the tool enters the Update Mode, the application would detect the tool automatically.
6. Check the files you want to update. Click “Print” Option, Print DTC Data.
 ☑️Covered 10000+ Cars Model
America(USA) :
Compatible with 12V Standard OBD2 Cars from 1996 to Now
For Chrysler; For Ford; For GM; For Jeep; For GMC; For BUICK; For Saturn; For Pontiac; For Chery
Europe:
Compatible with 12V Standard OBD2 Cars from 1996 to Now
For Alfa Romeo; For SAAB; For Acura; For Opel; For Audi; For Seat; For Bentley; For Skoda; For Daewoo; For  Benz; For Daihatsu; For Land Rover ( after 2005 year - ) , For BMW; For Vauxhall; For Volvo; For Fiat; For VW ( after 2005 year - ) ; For Ford;For Jaguar
Asian:
Compatible with 12V Standard OBD2 Cars from 2005 to Now
For KIA; For Isuzu; For Honda; For Mitsubishi; For Hyundai; For Dacia; For Lexus; For Mazda; For Nissan; For Subaru; For Suzuki; For Toyota
Australia:
Compatible with 12V Standard OBD2 Cars from 2004 to Now
For Holden; For Ford
🔔🔔Note: Even though it compatible with most cars, but different regions support the vehicle OBD2 protocol at different times,  so it may not compatible with some cars which do not support OBD2 protocol.If you are not sure whether it is support your car,please offer Car Brand, models and release year to seller to check it for you.
For Example : Toyota corolla, 2008，VIN:xxxxxx
🔔🔔Warning:
Not Support Russian Cars VAZ, UAZ, LADA ; Not works with trucks
Not Support for Renault Clio 2/Megane/Dacia Logan etc.
Not Support for Ssangyong Actyon, from 2009 to 2017 years.
Not Support for Ssangyong Korando, 2.0 TD Diesel, from 2013 to 2017 years.
Not Support for Ssangyong Kyron, 2.0 Diesel, from 2010 to 2017 years.
Not Support for Ssangyong Rexton, 2011 to 2017 years.
Not Support for Passat 1.9Tdi 2000
 ⭐Package List：
1PC x Vident iEasy310 pro Scanner
1PC x USB cable
1PC x Manual
   ☑️I/M Readiness One-Key Fast Check
Vident iEasy310Pro car fault code reader designed with 2.8'' TFT color screen, featuring with three color LED Indicators with alarm, One-Click I/M Readiness Quick check the emissions readiness and verification of drive cycle. Detect emission status and READ/CLEAR Trouble Code Hot keys to help you search trouble codes easily.
☑️ Supports 12V Standard Vehicles Battery Voltage Test
VIDENT iEASY 310Pro OBDII Code reader car diagnostic tool with reset, which can test and display the voltage of the battery analyze battery healthy status, view charging status, and detect faults and bad cells and give you an accurate test result.
☑️DTC Lookup & Code Breaker
Every code in iEasy310 Pro comes with a description to aid technicians in efficient vehicle diagnostics and repair. This will save you the trouble of having to go online to look for the meaning of a diagnostic trouble code. And you can also simply click on the error code selected so as to get an in-depth definition.
☑️ Lifetime Free Software Update via USB Connected to PC and Print DTC Data
iEasy310Pro car diagnostic reader provides lifelong free software updates via the Internet. There is no limit to the number of updates and functions. All functions and models are free of charge. The main purpose of the update is to add more models, fix errors, and bring you a better experience
iEasy310Pro Support Print Data From Diagnostic Tool To Computer Which More Convenience For You To View The Data. This Function Allows You To Send The Data To Your Mechanic For Help.
    ☑️ 4 In 1 Live Data Graph
Real-Time View of Data Streams Graphing & Logging. Display the real time PID data from ECU (as analog inputs and outputs, digital inputs and outputs, and system status information broadcast on the vehicle data stream). Support Multi- Parameter Display Graphics At the Same Time For Better Analysis of Vehicle Conditions, tells you exactly what you require to know about your vehicle.
☑️Vident iEasy310Pro OBD2 Scanner is Compatible Multi-Vehicles from the US, Europe, Asia.
Supported Protocols: J1850-41.6, J1850-10.4, ISO9141, KWP2000 (ISO 14230), and CAN (Control Area Network ISO 11898)
  ☑️ Vident iEasy310 Pro Support11 Kinds of Languages:  
English, French, German, Russian, Spanish, Italian, Portuguese, Hungarian, Swedish, Slovak, Czech
🔔🔔Note:There is no Polish and Netherland language. When you receive, get others languages by update tool.
  ☑️Advance Technical Specifications:
Display: 2.8” LCD color screen   
Operating Temperature: 0 to 60°C (32 to 140°F)
Storage Temperature: -20 to 70°C (-4 to 158°F)
Power: 8-18V Vehicle   
Unit Dimensions : 147*90*30(mm)  
Weight: 450g
PAYMENT
DELIVERY DETAILS
RETURN
ABOUT US
Contact us
1.We accept PayPal payment,PayPal Credit,Credit card or debit card and so on.
2.Please pay immediately after purchase.
3.We will leave a positive feedback immediately after payment is received. We appreciate a positive feedback as much as you do. If for some reason there is any issue with the purchase, please contact us prior to leaving feedback, we will be glad to work together and provide a satisfying solution.

title: 15x White Interior LED Lights  + Reverse Backup Bulbs For Ford F-150 1997-2003
item_description:
15pcs Canbus Interior LED Lights For Ford F-150 1997-2003
Map light (2 pieces)
Dome Light (3 pieces)
Door light (4 pieces) 
License plate light (2 pieces)
Spare light (2 pieces)
Reverse Light(2 pieces)
Color: White
About our products:
▶ we will offer installantion Diagram，you will know which bulbs to install where
▶ Provides these bright Error Free LED bulbs, perfect replacement of the original bulbs, it makes a much brighter interior lighting for your car.
▶ All LED bulbs are 100% Canbus Error Free Plug and play, with no modification needed.
▶ Product pictures are for LED bulb type reference only, we will provide compatible LED interior light kits according to the your car.

Installation:
1.Please turn off the light first before installation and be careful while removing the stock bulb, it may be very hot. 
2.Simply remove your old bulb and install the new LED bulb in it's place. If the light doesn't immediately turn on flip it 180 degrees. 
3.Please kindly move the metal pin clips closer so that they can mount the festoon tighter in case the bulb is slightly loose in socket
Payment
Delivery details
Warranty
About us
Contact us
1.We only accept eBay payment.
If you have any questions with your payment, please let us know and we will do our best to help you.
Your satisfaction is our service tenet.
2.We Will Only Ship To eBay Confirmed And Verified Address, Please Update Your Shipping Address On eBay Before Placing The Order.

title: 20pcs 6500K LED Interior Lights Bulbs Kit Car Trunk Dome License Plate Lamps NEW
item_description:
Timing Chain Kit
Valve covers
Camshaft Kits
Oil sump
Connecting Rod 
20pcs 6500K LED Interior Lights Bulbs Kit Car Trunk Dome License Plate Lamps NEW
Product Features: 
100% brand new and high quality.
This Interior Xenon White LED Kit Will Include the Following bulbs for general applications around the interior of your vehicle such as Dome, Map, Door, Glove Box, License Plates etc.
Plug and play with no modifications required.
This kit includes the most popular led sold in the market today to fit well over 25,000 cars. All lights in this kit have the T10 & 28-31mm festoon connections.
T10 = W5W 12V 2825 192 194 158 168 501 175 PC175 906 904 161 etc.
31MM Festoon = 3021 3022 3175 6428 6430 DE3157 DE3021 DE3023 etc.
If they don't light after inserting into the socket, insert oppositely.

title: Car Radio Stereo For Kia Optima K5 2011-2015 Android 13 GPS Navi 48EQ Cam 4+32GB
item_description:
4+32GB Car Radio Stereo For Kia Optima K5 2011-2015 Android 13 GPS Navi 48EQ Cam
Features: 
●HD 9.1" 2.5D Capacitive touch screen   
●Wireless & Wired Carplay: wired or wireless Carplay in-vehicle system can closely integrate the user's iOS device and iOS experience with the dashboard system. Users who use wireless Carplay can connect to the car system via Bluetooth to realize voice-controlled navigation, make calls, send and receive messages, and listen to music.
● Wireless & Wired Android auto: wired or wireless Android auto in-vehicle system can closely integrate the user's Android device and Android experience with the dashboard system. Users who use wireless Android auto can connect to the car system via Bluetooth to realize voice-controlled navigation, make calls, send and receive messages, and listen to music. It is only available for Android phone（Android phones need to download android auto APP） .
●Built-in GPS Navigation: Users can purchase directly from play store for offline navigation. With wifi connected, Google Maps can be used perfectly, you can go anywhere you want and never get lost again.
●High definition 1080P: Full capacitance touch screen for easy operation, well designed user interface for car only.
●Built-in WIFI: Connect to WIFI, and you will find a new world，the most convenient one is the online map.
●Rear camera: support AHD high-definition 1080P camera image input.
●Hi-Fi function: High fidelity, reproduced sound highly similar to your original sound
●Steering wheel control: Through it you can control the functions you need by steering wheel, more convenient
●Built-in bluetooth with A2DP/Hands Free/Phone book:bluetooth hands-free calls,bluetooth music player,Auto loading phonebooks
●Double USB adapter input
●Support file manager: Support download, install and delete over thousands of android apps
●Support multilanguage: Support languages, up to 40 national languages
●You can enjoy music from you mobilephone without any cables, and also support USB connetion.
●FM Radio: Online music you can transfer the music to the car stereo by FM to enjoy the original car stereo sound,with 18 preset stations
●Time Setting:You can use the network or GPS to open the date and time automatically, or you can adjust it manually.
●Support external microphone  
Specifications:
System:Android 13
Screen size: 9.1''  
Memory: 4GB (RAM)+32GB (ROM)
Screen Resolution:1280*720 
CPU: 4 cores
bluetooth Version:5.0
Power output:4*45W
Voltage:DC 12V
Work temperature:-20℃-70℃
Apple CarPlay: Support Wireless/Wired Connection
Android Auto: Support Wireless/Wired Connection
Wifi:Support
GPS:Support
Steering wheel control function:Support
camera: support 
Reversing input: AHD/CVBS
Video output:Support
Maps:Built-in offline maps(requires internet to download data)
USB:Double USB interface
Radio Band:FM
Audio format:FLAC/WAV/MP3/WMA etc
Video format:MKV/RMVB/AVI/MP4/MDV etc 
Picture format:PNG/JPEG/JPG/GIF/WBMP/BNP etc
 Package Included:  
1 x Car MP5 Player
1 x Power Cable
1 x GPS Antenna
1 x Camera
1 x Rear Camera lnput Cable
1 x RCA Cable
2 x USB Cable
1 x Crowbar
1 x Instruction manual

Delivery details
Return Policy
Feedback

title: Carpuride W702 Apple Carplay Android Auto Waterproof Touchscreen Dual Bluetooth
item_description:
Carpuride W702 Apple Carplay Android Auto Waterproof Touchscreen Dual Bluetooth

【Wireless CarPlay and Android Auto for Motorcycles】: Our carpuride W702 motorcycle carpaly has CarPlay or Android Auto functionality. By wirelessly connecting your smartphone to your motorcycle's touchscreen via Bluetooth, you can access map navigation, phone calls, music playback, text messaging, and more with the help of Siri or G00gle Assistant. Keeping your hands free allows you to focus on the road and ride safely.
【Built-in Dual Bluetooth】: Carpuride W702 Motorcycle GPS carplay features built-in Dual Bluetooth connectivity, pair the carplay touch screen with your smartphone and Bluetooth-enabled headphones or helmet, you can make hands-free calls or enjoy your favorite music, without take off your helmet. The convenience of dual Bluetooth seamless connection not only keeps your phone safely in your pocket but also allows you to enjoy a free riding experience.
【7" HD IPS Touch Screen】: The carplay screen for motorcycle is equipped with a 7-inch high-definition IPS touch screen with a resolution of 1024*600, making the visual effect more intuitive and the touch responsive. Vibrant 65K color and up to 1000nit peak brightness ，provide a clear and wonderful viewing experience even under bright outdoor sunlight, and include 64G TF cards.
【IP67 Waterproof & Anti-Theft Design】: IP67 Waterproof and Durable design, even if you ride in the rain or scorching sun, our motorcycle carplay screen can still be used normally, no need to worry about all kinds of weather! The Thief-proof detachable bracket design keeps the motorbike touch screen under control, providing you with higher security and convenience. It works flawlessly in a temperature range of -20°C to 70°C.
【Built-in EQ 】With its built-in preset EQ and user-customized 16-band HD EQ with 12 adjustable frequency sections, you can enjoy a wide variety of music styles and sound effects. when playing music through SD, and Bluetooth Music, click EQ,open or close "Loud" to turn on/off the bass effect, you can also choose the sound effect mode, rock, classical, jazz,and other sound effects.
【Two Power Connection Options】Using the motorcycle power line to provide 12V and 1A to the battery. The motorcycle's USB port provides a current of 5V and 2.5A or higher, use the USB boost cable to directly connect the W702 device to the motorcycle's USB port. The W702 has built-in reverse protection for convenience. Even if the cable is connected incorrectly, the device will not be damaged.
【Easy Installation, Suitable for All Motorcycles】: This portable motorcycle car screen comes with a bracket kit and tools for easy installation. Specially designed bracket kit and screw system with a safe and stable setup makes it easy to securely mount the screen on any motorcycle; (Simple wiring, ACC +12V and ground), NOTE: Not perfectly compatible with Samsung Note as well as S series. Before buy, please make sure your phone supports wireless carplay or wireless android auto.
【Customer Service & Products Included】: Carpuride customer service team will provide you with satisfactory after-sales service, if you have any problems in the process of using, please contact us by email or call the US customer service number, we will have professional staff to help you solve the problems. Products Included: 1x 7 inch Motorcycle carplay screen ,1x Power line, 1X USB Boost Cable,1x U-shaped Support, 1X64G TF, 1x Extension Rod, 1x User manual.
【Notice】: The accessory 64GTF card does not support software upgrades. It only supports storing music and videos for local playback. If you want to update software, please use a small capacity 32, 16, 8, 4GB card.
【Notice】: When using the motorcycle power line to supply power to the battery, ensure that the output voltage and current are 12V, 1A. If the USB port on the motorcycle outputs voltage and current less than 5V, 2A, it is not recommended to use the Carpuride moto to connect the USB boost line, as insufficient voltage or current may cause the motorcycle carplay screen to automatically shut down.


Use your iPhone or Android Smartphone, easily connected to our Carpuride Motorcycle Carpaly Screen via Bluetooth, you can not only enjoy music, making phone calls, but also stay focused on ride, Keep you ride safely and happily on the road！

Wireless CarPlay & Android Auto

Compatible with Wireless Apple CarPlay Compatible with Wireless Android Auto
The Motorcycle Carpaly support IOS system: Connect to your iPhone via Bluetooth wireless conenction, you easy to access your iPhone apps and features .With help of smart Siri voice assistant, you can make hands-free calls, play music, map navigation, and much more. The Motorcycle Carpaly support Android System: Connect to your phone via Bluetooth wireless conenction , allowing you easy to access your Android phone apps and features .With help of g00gle assistant, you can make hands-free calls, enjoy music, send and receive messages, map navigation.


How To Set Up Helmet and Headset ?


Pair your phone to the Motorcycle carplay screen via Bluetooth, pair the unit to your Bluetooth helmet/earphone, then you can adjust the volume and make hands-free calls by your helmet or earphone. Enjoy the freedom of seamless connectivity and enhanced functionality while riding.

About us
Return Policy
Payment
Contact us
We would ship out the item within 1-2 business days after the payment is received. We will test goods carefully before ship out.
The package will be ship from California warehouse.The items will arrrive to you about 2-4 days in normal conditions.
We only ship to the confirmed address provided. Before you pay, please make sure the address you would like us to ship to.

1.Please turn off the light first before installation and be careful while removing the stock bulb, it may be very hot.

title: 2024 Topdon Phoenix MAX OE-Level Full System Cloud-Based Programming & Coding
item_description:
PHOENIX MAX---Professional High-End Diagnostic Scanner
The Phoneix Max is TOPDON's newest cutting-edge automotive diagnostic scan tool.
With a 13.3" screen, this all-in-one tool offers a wide array of functionalities that will expand any technician's capacity to complete every job.
The Phoenix Max includes a 4-channel oscilloscope, ADAS compatibility, and Topology Mapping that shows all car systems in one view and 24V software for trucks and machinery. Its updated VCI includes J2534, CanFD, DoIP, D-PDU, and RP1210 protocols, allowing professionals to perform more complex repairs on a variety of automotive and heavy-duty vehicles.
  FEATURES
✅ 3 Years of Free Updates
✅ Cloud-Based Programming & Online Coding
✅ Automotive and Heavy-Duty Coverage
✅ OE-Level Full Systems Diagnostics
✅ Supports J2534, DoIP, CanFD, D-PDU, and RP1210 protocols.
✅ Hi-Tech Hardware
✅ Compatible with TOPDON ADAS, IMMO, and Battery Tester.
✅ 41+ Special Functions
✅ 200+ Car Brands Covered
  2-IN-1 CAR & HEAVY DUTY TRUCK SCANNER
Covers 200+ Cars and Heavy Duty Trucks In Total
✔️ Passenger Cars
✔️ Commercial Cars
✔️ Hybrid Cars 
✔️ Heavy Duty Vehicles 
    Cloud-Based Programming FOR 15+ BRANDS 
👉 Audi Guide Function, Personalization, Module Programing
👉  BMW Coding, Initialization, Personalization (E & F series) module programming, DTC repair guide
👉 Land Rover/Jaguar Module Programming
👉 Mercedes-Benz Module programming, SCN Coding
👉  Nissan Module Programming
👉  Porsche Module Programming, Personalization
👉 Volkswagen Guide Function, Personalization, Module Programming
DO MORE WITH SPECIAL SETTINGS
With the Phoenix Max, users can unlock special features and settings within vehicles. These advanced capabilities include enabling Video-In-Motion via DVD or USB, disabling the seatbelt light, and more. Applicable to vehicle makes such as Audi, VW, BMW, Porsche, Toyota, and more!
  HIGH-PERFORMANCE PHOENIX SCOPE
The included Phoenix Scope allows you to diagnose component and circuit faults with even more precision. With its color-coded channels, you can analyze and compare multiple components with ease.
Fix those hard-to-find intermittent problems by evaluating sensors, ignition components, pressure/vacuum related faults, and much more with pinpoint accuracy.
Explore More Features On the Phoenix MAX
👍40+ maintenance services for mainstream vehicle models.
👍 Topology map granting a clear picture of relational vehicle systems and status.
👍 Full-system diagnostic (Engine, Transmission, Airbag, ABS, ESP, TPMS, Immobilizer, Gateway, Steering, Radio, Air Conditioning) for over 200 vehicle models.
👍 5 Full-system diagnostic basic functions: access ECU info, read DTCs, clear DTCs, read data stream, active test.
👍 AutoVIN for automatic vehicle identification.
👍 Guide Function for VAG.
👍 The FCA Secure Gateway Module(SGW) unlocks the FCA vehicle, in order to perform functions such as clearing DTCs, bi-directional testing and calibration.
👍 Data stream recording for users to play back diagnostic activities.
👍 Docking station so your machine is always on charge when on stand-by 
MORE THAN A DIAGNOSTIC TOOL
T-Ninja Box
Read and write key chip data,  generate special keys, and more. Compatible with the most prominent ECU, MCU, and EEPROM Manufacturers.
Add New Keys
All Keys Lost
Remote Learning
Phoenix Mobile ADAS
Combine the Phoenix Max with Phoenix ADAS kit and calibrate the passive and active ADAS systems.
BTMobile ProS
Pair with the BTMobile ProS and turn the Phoenix Max into a hi-tech battery testing tool.
HASSLE-FREE DIAGNOSTIC SCANNER
OPERATE IN 22 LANGUAGES
English, German, Spanish, French, Italian, Japanese, Portuguese, Russian, Polish, Turkish, Dutch, Hungarian, Chinese (Traditional), Korean, Greek, Slovak, Romanian, Arabic, Croatian, Slovenian, Finnish, Czech
WIDE VEHICLE COMPATIBILITY
  Specifications

System: Android 9.0
Screen: 13.3" full-fitting, sunlight-readable screen
Resolution: 1920*1080p
Supports: 2.4GHz & 5GHz dual frequency

title: XTOOL D8 Auto Bidirectional Scanner Full System Diagnostic CANFD Key Coding Tool
item_description:
XTOOL D8 Auto Bidirectional Scanner Full System Diagnostic CANFD Key Coding Tool
2024 NEWEST XTOOL D8 ALL IN ONE PROFESSIONAL DIAGNOSTIC TOOL WITH :
💫All System Diagnostic,💫Bi-directional Control(Active Test),💫CANFD,💫E/CU Coding & Configuration,💫E/CU Offline Programming(PMI),💫ADAS Calibration,💫Full OBD2 Functions,💫Auto VIN Scan,💫38+ Reset Functions,💫Topology Mapping,💫Guide Function,💫Key Programming,💫8-IN-1 Live Data Stream,💫3-years Free Update,💫15+ Languages Support ,💫One-click Update via WIFI ,💫99% Vehicle Coverage ...
Top Reasons to Choose XTOOL D8 Scanner:
>>All System Diagnostic: Read/clear trouble code,read e/cu information,read live data,read freeze frame for full system(ABS, SRS, Engine, Transmission, Brake System, Emission System, Fuel system, Light system, Wiper System etc.),quickly troubleshooting the vehicle issues
>>Advanced E/CU Coding: ✅Personalize vehicles settings,✅disable annoying functions,✅component matching,etc(fit for VW,fit forAudi,fit for Skoda only).
>>Bi-directional Control(Active Test): Receive information and send the commands to the system/components to perform active tests like EVAP Test, Fuel Pump, Fuel Injector Test, Cycling A/C Clutch On/Off, Window/Door Lock/ Horn, EGR Test, etc.
>>CAN FD Protocol: XTOOL D8 support CANFD for faster data transfer(fit for GM vehicles after 2020). 
>>38+ Reset Functions:Cover for complete diagnosis and reset functions in routine maintenance.
>>Full OBD2 Functions: Full 10 OBD2 Modes includes read / clear trouble code, live data, read freeze frame, read e/cu information, on-board monitor test, O2 monitor test, i/m readiness etc...
>>Key Programming(basic) : Read pin code + add new keys (fob/smart)+ remote learning + all key lost...
>>Topology Mapping: Dive right into the abnormal module or related modules to boost repair efficiency.
>>Guide Function:Provide instructions step by step when diagnosis or performing complicated functions like E/CU Coding(fit for VW,fit forAudi,fit for Skoda only).
>>Programmable Module Installation(PMI):Copy the original modules and installation to the new unit to finish the module replacement.
>>8-in-1 Data Graph: Display 8 data streams (Graphics & Text) at one time, to better help you monitor and analyze the health status of the system.
>>Auto VIN: Automatically identify your vehicle information without manually entering the VIN.
>>3-Year Free Software Update & 15+ Language
>>High-end Configuration: ✔️Android 5,✔️8 " Touch Screen,✔️10000mAh Battery,✔️2G RAM,✔️64G ROM,✔️Wire Connection
 Full System Diagnostic Scan Tool
XTOOL D8 can access and scan all available modules and systems in your vehicle; such as ECM, TCM, ABS, SRS, BCM, IMMO, BMS, TPMS, SAS, fuel system, light system, A/C system, etc.
Read Code:Read the fault code, fault description, and fault code status within the selected module.
Clear Code:Clear the fault code in the selected module and turn off the fault light on the meter.
Read Live Data:Reading all the data flow information contained within the selected module.
Read Freeze Frame:Accompanied by fault codes, record the state of fault codes appearing.
Read E/CU Information:Read the version information, model information, etc. of the selected module.
 Full OBD2 Functions
【Read Trouble Code】Displays the fault codes currently stored in the powertrain that cause the MIL lamp to illuminate
【Clear Trouble Code】Clear fault codes and freeze frames in the powertrain that have illuminated the MIL light, and pending fault codes
【Live Data】Recognizes vehicle powertrain information and displays currently available data on diagnostic equipment.
【Read Freeze Frame】Displays freeze frame data such as the time when the error code appeared, mileage, and other information.
【I/M Readiness】Identify vehicle powertrain information such as engine speed, water temperature, ignition advance angle, intake pressure, and fuel system closed loop status.
【On-Board Monitor Test】Test results of in-vehicle systems and in-vehicle monitors.
【O2S Monitoring Test】Displays the Oxygen Sensor Monitor screen and the collected oxygen sensor test results.
【Component Test】Control testing of online systems or components.
【Vehicle Information】Display the whole vehicle information. Vehicle identification code, calibration ID, calibration verification ID, E/CU name and other information.
【Monitoring of fire data】Test results of in-vehicle systems and in-vehicle monitors,fire data monitoring is important within the mode.
 Advanced E/CU Coding & Configuration(fit for VW,fit for Audi,fit for Skoda only)
XTOOL D8 E/CU coding scan tool can perform coding & configuration, components matching, adaptive data reset and flash hidden functions to enhance vehicle performance and personalize car settings after replacing the E/CU.
Recode Replaced Modules: Download data from server and write it to new E/CU after replacing E/CU.
Renew E/CUs Coordination: Update the E/CU software to latest version to optimize car performance.
Reset Adaptive Data: Reset the adaptive value after repairing or replacing the E/CU.
Refresh Hidden Functions: Enable hidden functions or disable infrequently used functions to personalize car settings.
Customize the vehicle OE settings
Bi-directional Control (Active Test)
XTOOL D8 bidirectional scan tool can use active tests to output commands to the E/CU, to turn on/off control modules or components without using the vehicle controls, thus saving diagnosis time.
〰️Commonly-Used Tests include:
EVAP Vent / Purge Solenoid, EVAP Purge/ Seal
Fuel Injector Test
Cycling A/C Clutch Relay
Cycling ABS Motor Pump
Cooling Fan Test
HVAC Recalibration
Window/ Light/ Door Lock/ Headlamp Test
  38+ Hot Reset Functions:
XTOOL D8 support 38+ reset functions includes:1. Oil Rest 2. Throttle Reset 3. EPB Reset 4. SAS Adjustment 5. Immobilization /Key FOB Programming 6. Instrument Cluster 7. Gearbox Match 8. BMS Reset 9. Injector Coding 10. DPF 11. Gear Learning 12. TPMS Reset 13. Power Balance 14. Tire Upgrade 15. Disable Transportation Mode 16. A/F Reset 17. Headlight Reset 18. Electronic Pump Activation 19. Air Suspension Reset 20. Seat Match 21. EEPROM Adapter 22. ABS Bleeding 23. Stop/Start Reset 24. Windows Initialization 25. Airbag Reset 26. Language Change 27. Control Unit Reset 28. Rain/Light Sensor Relearn 29. A/C Relearn 30. HV Battery 31. VGT Relearn 32. FRM Reset 33. EGR Relearn 34. SRS Calibration 35. Clutch Adaption 36. Disable Speed Limit 37. ECU Configurations (DIY Mode) 38. ADAS Calibration...
Oil Rest:Reset the new calculation of Engine Oil Life System for an accurate reading of the next oil change.
Throttle Reset: Reset the throttle to accurately regulate throttle ( or idle engine ) operations, helps keep your idling and acceleration smooth.
EPB Reset:Reset the calipers, brake discs or pads after the electronic parking brake system is repaired.
SAS Adjustment: Clear the fault steering angle sensor memories, perform reset steering angle sensor, and turn off steering wheel warning light.
Immobilization /Key FOB Programming:Disable a lost vehicle key to protect the vehicle from being stolen and add a new key.
